Geometry_and_Meshing: IGES/STEP if direct geometry import for embedded meshing
Material_Properties: Vendor data sheets for advanced composites or metals
Boundary_Conditions: GUI-based bc definitions stored in .db files
Solver_Settings: Solver decks specifying analysis type (Linear, Nonlinear, Modal, Buckling)
Reference_Data: Legacy input decks or partial solutions for reanalysis
Standards or code references (ASME, AISC, etc.)
